messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: ATLANTA POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION SECTION
Missing Persons Unit
SIGNAL: 81M
ITEM NUMBER: M-81033-18
PAGE 15 of 45
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Gregory Allen
Sgt. Melissa Carter
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Rachel Young
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Thomas Reed
Sgt. Angela Lewis
( Child Protection Unit)
Det. Brian Phillips
Det. Stephanie Moore
( Child Protection Unit)
Det. Joseph Andrews
( Child Protection Unit)
Det. Karen James
Det. Michael Torres
(General Assignment)
Det. Elizabeth Garcia
(Traffic Investigation Section)
Det. Peter Wilson
(Violent Crimes Section)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, age 7.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
09 JUNE 2018 at around 6:00 PM in the East Atlanta area.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Rachel Young
3629
The investigation, tangled with multiple leads and scarce evidence, posed significant challenges. Officer Thompson, on a routine patrol in East Atlanta, was first to respond to the missing child report. Accompanied by Sgt. Thomas Reed and Patrol Officer Gonzalez, they initiated a neighborhood search. Technician Bailey, known for expertise in digital tracking, joined to assist in locating the child. Criminalist Rodriguez, sifting through minimal evidence, identified belongings of the missing child. Coroner Dr. Smith was later consulted to examine an unrelated case nearby, which fortuitously provided a breakthrough in the missing child case. Patrol Officer Hernandez, working closely with the community, gathered crucial information that led to the discovery of the child.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Gregory Allen Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Missing Persons Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Melissa Carter Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Allen. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Rachel Young Officer Context: Lead investigator for the missing child case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Thomas Reed Officer Context: Assisted in the neighborhood search, part of the Child Protection Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Angela Lewis Officer Context: Child Protection Unit sergeant, supported the search operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Brian Phillips Officer Context: Child Protection Unit detective, contributed to the search. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Stephanie Moore Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Child Protection Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Joseph Andrews Officer Context: Child Protection Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Karen James Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Michael Torres Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the missing child case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Elizabeth Garcia Officer Context: Traffic Investigation Section detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Peter Wilson Officer Context: Violent Crimes Section detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Thompson Officer Context: First responder to the missing child report in East Atlanta. Officer Role: Patrolling Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Gonzalez Officer Context: Assisted in the neighborhood search for the missing child. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Bailey Officer Context: Specialized in digital tracking, assisted in locating the child. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Rodriguez Officer Context: Analyzed evidence, identified belongings of the missing child. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Smith Officer Context: Consulted for an unrelated case, provided a breakthrough in the missing child case. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Hernandez Officer Context: Gathered crucial information from the community, aiding in the discovery of the child. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
